name: Using Wikiversity in the Classroom
tagline: This is the base repo for the WRIT 350 technical documentation project.
body: Our group created a lesson plan for a middle school teacher to use in the classroom. This lesson plan described an activity where students used Wikiversity, among other Wiki medias, to complete a project about a particular culture.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
